sub_fields.label: Content Picker (Auto)
sub_fields.name: content_picker_auto
sub_fields.instructions: Get content items by specific post types and/or categories.

sub_fields.label: Content Picker Ordering
sub_fields.name: content_picker_ordering
sub_fields.instructions: If individual post items aren't chosen the items will be ordered in this manner.

sub_fields.label: Content Picker Order By
sub_fields.name: content_picker_order_by
sub_fields.instructions: If individual post items aren't chosen the items will be ordered by this metric.

sub_fields.label: Show Carousel Track?
sub_fields.name: show_carousel_track
sub_fields.instructions: Shows the contents of the carousel outside of its container if true.

sub_fields.label: Logo Image
sub_fields.name: banner_logo_image
sub_fields.instructions: The upper left image on mastheads such as the home page.

sub_fields.label: Has Gradient?
sub_fields.name: has_gradient
sub_fields.instructions: Displays a soft black to transparent gradient over the banner background image.

sub_fields.label: Search Subject
sub_fields.name: search_subject
sub_fields.instructions: Select an item of that is the type of post you wish to search by.

sub_fields.label: Banner Control Type
sub_fields.name: banner_control_type
sub_fields.instructions: Whether the slide control is arrows or dots.

sub_fields.label: Feeds
sub_fields.name: feeds
sub_fields.instructions: Select the social feeds to show.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Vertical nav anchors appear at a fixed position in the viewport (default: top-right).
